title: Local Event: Marin Art and Garden Center - Sound Healing Ceremony
author: Stef Shaw; Neighbor
description: Check out the latest community post from one of your neighbors. (The views expressed in this post are the author's own.)
cleaned_text: and Dan Dowdell. A sound meditation/healing ceremony to hold space for those grieving any type of loss - a life, a loved one, a relationship. 10 am - Add an object to honor your loss (flower, candle, photo, poem, memento) to the communal altar. Set an intention. 10:30 am - Doors close. Meditation begins. Sound journey using curation of sacred and exotic instruments - crystal bowls, gongs, didgeridoo, flutes, chimes and crystal harps. Following the ceremony, tea served.
